授業目的: The purpose of this course is to familiarize students with the TOEFL test
到達目標:
Students will be able to understand the general outline of the TOEFL test
Students will be able to practice the writing test under exam conditions
授業方法:
Individual work
Pair work
Information for students permitted to take the class online.
The syllabus can be followed at home EXACTLY as it would have been in class, but students can send me their weekly work by email. Students will be asked to have a zoom meeting with the teacher once per week to offer learning support.

第1回: Students will be given a reading pack to be completed and handed in before the final class.

第5回: Textbook pages 137-160 - read, summarize and discuss.
第6回: Textbook pages 177-301 - read, summarize and discuss.

第8回: Model test 1 - Independent task only - Page 168
